item.title: Boost Your Workout with These Pre-Workout Snacks
item.description: Are you someone who hits the gym or goes on a morning run regularly? It's important to fuel up before your workout to make sure you have enough energy to power through. Here are some pre-workout snacks that will give you the energy you need to get the most out of your workout: Bananas with Almond Butter Bananas are an excellent source of carbohydrates that can provide instant energy. They also contain potassium, which helps prevent muscle cramps.
